channel.title: AT Command with MangOH
channel.description:
Hello,
I would like to use AT command with 3V3 LVTTL RX/TX Pins on MangOH Red. My main goal is to simulate usage of HL7802 with WP7702. Is it possible? Thx for your support
Best regards
Francois

item.title: AT Command with MangOH
item.dc:creator: thibs
item.description:
François,

Please see WP7700 AT command Interface over UART using MangOH Red

But you’ll get the set of AT commands for the WP77, which is different from the AT command set for the HL. Cf. respective AT command guides on https://source.sierrawireless.com

Read full topic
